Posts.EditableText:
Can you actually draw on the grid, then? I would like to know how that is done.  Are there multiple methods people can outline. I am not even really good at understanding code, but I am interested and will certainly try it.
And what is the drawing grid/ map called in scripts? What do I call it if I want to hide it midgame, as in <request (Hide, " ")>?
Can the background behind it also be hidden? There is a square cut out over my blended background, and I thought I might hide it, or even just make it smaller.
Posts.HTML:
Can you actually draw on the grid, then? I would like to know how that is done. Are there multiple methods people can outline. I am not even really good at understanding code, but I am interested and will certainly try it.
And what is the drawing grid/ map called in scripts? What do I call it if I want to hide it midgame, as in <request (Hide, " ")>?
Can the background behind it also be hidden? There is a square cut out over my blended background, and I thought I might hide it, or even just make it smaller.
